properties.entry: SELECT P.P_NAME ,P.PRICE ,P.IMAGE_URL1 ,OR_DATE ,O.OR_NO ,P.P_CODE FROM PRODUCT p JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON (P.P_CODE = OP.P_CODE) JOIN "ORDER" O ON (OP.OR_NO = O.OR_NO) WHERE O.MEM_NO=? AND REVIEW_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.IMAGE_URL1 ,P.P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,P.PRICE ,REVIEW_SCOPE ,REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON (R.P_CODE = P.P_CODE) JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON (P.P_CODE = OP.P_CODE) JOIN "ORDER" O ON (OP.OR_NO = O.OR_NO) WHERE R.MEM_NO=? AND WRITE_YN='Y'

SELECT P.IMAGE_URL1 ,P.P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,P.PRICE ,P.P_CODE FROM PRODUCT P JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON (P.P_CODE = OP.P_CODE) JOIN "ORDER" O ON (OP.OR_NO = O.OR_NO) WHERE O.MEM_NO = ? AND OP.OR_NO = ? AND P.P_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , MEM_NO , P_NAME , P_CODE , REVIEW_SCOPE , REVIEW_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_REV.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL , SEQ_REV.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
